divs: Sighting DetailsHeard police car radio report lights over the town. Wife and I went outside house and observed seven lights moving south to north in line astern. Est 30 seconds to one minute between lights. View partly blocked by trees. No wind, no sound from objects. Normal night sounds very light traffic sounds. Heard radio comment about 10:32 PM on May 27. Lights study reddish mixed with gold color. Study light, study flight caracteristics. No aircraft or chopper seen. Lights glowing, no bean or reflections. Did not illuminate area.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kirksville
There were no other sightings in Kirksville on or around May 27th 2012
Summary: Herd law enforcement comment, observe 7 lights moving south to north about 1 city block away and est 200 feet high est speed 50 mph
